name: Blind Black- Blaze Orange - Snow White - Hot Doe Pink -  Hoodies
description:
THEY ARE BACK!!!! 
HUNTAHOLICS HOODIES!  
2 new colors....
In the woods, around the campfire, to the store or even sitting in a blind.   Blind Black- Blaze Orange - Snowy White - Hot Doe Pink -  

Specs:
    9-ounce, 50/50 cotton/poly fleece
    Two-ply hood
    Dyed-to-match drawcord
    Set-in sleeves
    Front pouch pocket

Our Hoodies are a huge seller and look great!
Very comfy and stylish.

Adult Sizes: S-3XL Full color screen printed logo on front.
Show your true addiction for the hunt. 

****Please note***  The time of delivery will depend on the rate of sales. There is a minimum order quantity that must be met before the order is placed.  You will receive email updates as to the progress of your order.

Thanks for staying ADDICTED TO THE HUNT!

name: Huntaholics Hats
description:
Black Trucker Hats

Realtree - Pigment dying the front panels, visor and closure gives this cap an oiled leather look. A popular camo pattern completes the mid and back panels.


***ALL ORDERS ARE PRE-ORDERS***THIS MEANS THAT WHEN WE HAVE ENOUGH ORDERS WE WILL ORDER, THEN SHIP TO YOU.  DELIVERY WILL DEPEND ON HOW FAST WE RECEIVE ENOUGH ORDERS.  REGARDLESS, IF YOU PLACE AN ORDER WE WILL BE SURE YOU GET YOUR ITEMS ASAP***  

New from Huntaholics Outdoors!

A great go-to cap for days afield or everyday wear. Embroidered logos on front lets everyone know your passion whether youâ€™re coming or going.

name: Russell Outdoors Long or Short Sleeved Shirt or CAMO HOODIES
description:
NOTE:****TIME OF DELIVERY WILL DEPEND COMPLETELY ON SALES AND ORDER PROCESSING DATES**** 

These lightweight Explorer shirts are perfect for days out in the field.

    5.4-ounce, 100% cotton jersey
    Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
    Coverseamed neck
    Side seams
    Double-needle sleeves and hem

New CAMO HOODIES!
This outdoor essential comes equipped with a hood for extra warmth.

    8-ounce, 50/50 cotton/poly
    Hood with dyed-to-match drawcord
    Rib knit cuffs and waistband
    Side seams
    Set-in sleeves
    Front pouch pocket

Wearing your gear in the field is one thing, but wearing it year round shows that you are genuinely "addicted to the hunt" year round.  These items make a statement about you as a hunter and you as a person.  Get your unique "NEW" Huntaholics gear today and stay ADDICTED!

_________________________________________________
The first of its kind. Huntaholics is a brand new clothing line designed for the Addicted Hunter in mind.

name: Orange, Black or Mossy Oak Fleece Beanies
description:
This plush hat is the perfect warm accessory for chilly days. An anti-pill finish gives lasting wear.  95/5 poly/spandex R-Tek stretch fleece for warmth and shape retention

The Mossy Oak Beanie has an anti-pill finish for lasting wear and it's perfect for times you want warmth without bulk or weight. Great for early morning outings or layered under a helmet or hat. 

Time of delivery will vary, depending on sales.
Represent and be apart of the newest hunting brand and lifestyle.
